t: Amazon.com: Azalea 'Karen' (Azalea) Shrub, lavender flowers, #3 - Size Container : Everything Else

t: Karen Azalea, Azalea x 'Karen' (Gable Hybrid), Monrovia Plant
s: An unusually hardy and highly reliable evergreen shrub with rich lavender-purple hose-in-hose flowers on a vigorous, upright plant. Foliage turns a brilliant burgundy in the fall. Showiest when planted in groups. An ideal spring blooming foundation shrub for beds and borders.
